name.baseName: Production of epoxy resin ; polypropylene production
环氧树脂生产 ; 聚丙烯的生产

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This dataset represents the life cycle of a wind power generation system within a typical wind farm in Yulin City, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China. This system is used in the evaluation of environmental and economic performance of wind energy as compared to thermal power. The production process of both epoxy resin and polypropylene is involved as part of the manufacturing stage of the wind turbines' components. These materials are commonly used in the construction of wind turbine blades and components, owing to their strength, durability, and resistance to environmental factors.
本数据集代表位于中国广西壮族自治区玉林市的典型风电场系统的生命周期。该系统用于评估风能与火力发电相比的环境和经济性能。环氧树脂和聚丙烯的生产过程作为风力涡轮机组件制造阶段的一部分涉及到。这些材料通常用于制造风力涡轮机的叶片和组件，因其强度、耐用性和抵抗环境因素的能力而广泛使用。

quantitativeReference.functionalUnitOrOther: The generation of 1 kW h (kW h) of electricity is adapted as the functional unit in this study, and the corresponding amounts of CO2 emissions and air pollutants (SO2,NOX and PM10)perkWh of electricity are chosen as the indicators for environmental performances, and the monetary value (US$) of per kW h of electricity is chosen as the indicator for cost-effectiveness evaluation.

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: In this study, the typical wind farm system in Yulin City of Guangxi of Zhuang Autonomous Region China was selected as a case study site. The developer, namely, China Huadian Corporation, is a state-owned enterprise and devotes to develop wind power by providing wind power equipment and related service in China [37].
本研究选取中国广西壮族自治区玉林市的典型风电场系统作为案例研究地点。开发商即中国华电股份有限公司，是一家国有企业，通过提供风力发电设备及相关服务，致力于在中国发展风力发电[ 37 ]。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This dataset represents the life cycle of a wind power generation system within a typical wind farm in Yulin City, Guangxi Zhuang Autonomous Region, China. This system is used in the evaluation of environmental and economic performance of wind energy as compared to thermal power. The production process of both epoxy resin and polypropylene is involved as part of the manufacturing stage of the wind turbines' components. These materials are commonly used in the construction of wind turbine blades and components, owing to their strength, durability, and resistance to environmental factors.
本数据集代表位于中国广西壮族自治区玉林市的典型风电场系统的生命周期。该系统用于评估风能与火力发电相比的环境和经济性能。环氧树脂和聚丙烯的生产过程作为风力涡轮机组件制造阶段的一部分涉及到。这些材料通常用于制造风力涡轮机的叶片和组件，因其强度、耐用性和抵抗环境因素的能力而广泛使用。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: According to Introduced by the life cycle assessment approach [34,35], firstly the system boundaries boundary of wind energy as well as and thermal power are first identified. Then, methodology on evaluating both environmental and economic benefits is presented so that co-benefits can be quantified followed by the introduction of the methodologies on environmental as well as economic impacts evaluation from the co-benefits perspective.
根据引入的生命周期评价方法[ 34、35 ]，首先确定了风能和火力发电的系统边界。然后，提出了评价环境和经济效益的方法，以量化共同利益，并从共同利益的角度介绍了环境和经济影响评价的方法。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: This wind farm is equipped with 24 wind turbines, with a production capacity of 1.25 MW for each turbine, and t the operation life for each turbine is expected to be 20 years. The life cycle of one wind power system can be divided into five stages, including (1) production, (2) transportation and installation, (3) power generation, (4) maintenance, and (5) end-of-life recycling and disposal. The input of non-renewable energy has been shown in each stage. In this study, raw material, fossil fuel consumption and corresponding emissions have been taken into account of a life cycle process. Meanwhile, cost-effectiveness of a wind farm is considered because the cost plays a very important role in operating a wind farm [38]. Considering the data reliability and availability, the cost data of this wind farm was mainly extracted from a feasibility report of one wind farm (with a designed capacity of the 49.5 MW) in Kang ping County of Liaoning province [39].

该风电场装有24台风电机组，每台机组的生产能力为1.25 MW，预计每台机组的运行寿命为20年。风电系统的生命周期可分为5个阶段： (1)生产制造、 (2)运输和安装、 (3)发电、 (4)维护和 (5)报废回收和处置。不可再生能源的投入在各个阶段都有所体现。在这项研究中，原材料、化石燃料的消耗和相应的排放都考虑了一个生命周期过程。同时，考虑风电场的成本效益，因为成本在风电场运营中扮演着非常重要的角色[38]。考虑到数据的可靠性和可获得性，该风电场的成本数据主要取自辽宁省康平县某风电场(设计容量为49.5 MW)的可行性报告[39]
dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this dataset, users should adhere to the system boundaries as defined for wind energy and thermal power within the study. Users need to apply the provided life cycle assessment methodology for the evaluation of environmental and economic impacts. This includes considering the raw material consumption, energy use, and emissions across the life cycle—a functional unit of 1 kWh of electricity generation. For cost-effectiveness analysis, the monetary value of electricity per kWh should be considered. It is essential to account for the reliability and availability of the data, particularly cost data which is derived from the feasibility report of a wind farm in Kangping County, Liaoning Province.
使用此数据集时，用户应遵守研究中为风能和火力发电定义的系统边界。用户需要应用提供的生命周期评估方法来评价环境和经济影响。这包括在整个生命周期中考虑原材料消耗、能源使用和排放——以1kWh电力生成的功能单位。对于成本效益分析，应考虑每kWh电力的货币价值。考虑数据的可靠性和可获取性至关重要，特别是成本数据，该数据源自辽宁省康平县风电场的可行性报告。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
